jma::JMA_Dictionary Class Reference

JMA_Dictionary is a collection of DictArchive shared by multiple threads. More...

Detailed Description

bool jma::JMA_Dictionary::compile ( const std::vector< std::string > &  srcFiles,
const char *  destFile 
) [static]

Complile dictionary files srcVec into archive destFile.

Archive format.

Parameters:
srcFiles the file names of dictionary files
destFile the archive file name
Returns:
true for success, false for failure

All the [SECTION] below are rounded up to 512 bytes, the extra space is zero filled.

[TOTAL HEAD] version, 4 bytes file count, 4 bytes total size, 4 bytes (the uncompressed size of all sections below)

multiple [FILE HEAD] (compressed) file name, 500 bytes (terminated with null) file size in bytes, 4 bytes (maximum file size is 4 Gigabytes)

multiple [FILE CONTENT] (compressed)
